Question
========
Which of the following is a cornerstone practice in DevOps automation?

Answerlist
----------
* Manual code integration
* Continuous integration
* Traditional waterfall processes
* Infrequent, scheduled releases
* Isolated operational teams
* Unstructured testing routines
* Manual deployment

Solution
========
Continuous integration is a core DevOps practice that automatically tests and integrates code changes, quickly identifying issues.
